A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fun movie\, but I can't get over the glaring plot holes\, bad character development and the horrible storyline they created for Luke.
Good CGI\, action\, and Kylo is a little less of an emo youth.  The scenes with Kylo and Rey worked probably the better than everything else in the movie.  I also didn't mind the humor. It hits more than it misses. It will only bother you if you don't want to laugh in a SW movie.

Critics either don't understand Star Wars or are way to nice to Disney properties to give this over 90%
